context_of_use: This use case allows customers to manage their shopping cart by adding products before proceeding to checkout.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to purchase multiple items easily
description: Allows customers to add products to their shopping cart prior to checkout.
triggering_event: Customer decides to add a product to the cart.
preconditions: Customer is logged into their account.
postconditions: The selected product is added to the customer's shopping cart.
assumptions: The customer has access to the product catalog.
The system is operational and can process cart updates.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects a product → System displays product details.
2. Customer clicks 'Add to Cart' → System adds the product to the shopping cart and confirms the action.
